articles.title: Netanyahu Vows to Fully Occupy Gaza Amid Ceasefire Stalemate
articles.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has vowed to fully occupy Gaza, signaling an expansion of military operations as ceasefire talks with Hamas have stalled. This move comes amid increasing pressure from the families of hostages to end the conflict. – The Washington Post

articles.title: Top Hegseth Aide Attempts to Oust Senior White House Liaison from Pentagon
articles.description: A senior aide to Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth attempted to remove a White House liaison from the Pentagon, highlighting internal conflicts within the defense department. White House officials intervened to block the removal. – The Washington Post

articles.title: Texas Republicans Vote to Issue Civil Arrest Warrants for Dozens of Democrats
articles.description: Texas House Republicans voted to authorize the civil arrest of Democratic lawmakers who fled the state to block GOP redistricting efforts, escalating tensions in the state's political landscape. – The Washington Post
